movie.title: Sonny Capone
movie.description_intro: When Sonny Capone, Dublin-born head of the Mafia in Rome, hears that his son Luke has been murdered in Dublin, he returns home to kill everyone in sight. Pitted against Dublin's notorious drug baron, James 'The Predator' Barrett, Sonny summons his Mafia gang to Dublin, where a final showdown will leave just one blood-drenched man standing.
movie.description_full: When Sonny Capone, Dublin-born head of the Mafia in Rome, hears that his son Luke has been murdered in Dublin, he returns home to kill everyone in sight. Pitted against Dublin's notorious drug baron, James 'The Predator' Barrett, Sonny summons his Mafia gang to Dublin, where a final showdown will leave just one blood-drenched man standing.

movies.title: The Pirates
movies.summary: A band of pirates and a group of bandits fight to catch a gray whale that has swallowed a royal stamp.
movies.description_full: A band of pirates and a group of bandits fight to catch a gray whale that has swallowed a royal stamp.
movies.synopsis: A band of pirates and a group of bandits fight to catch a gray whale that has swallowed a royal stamp.

movies.title: The Life Ahead
movies.summary: In seaside Italy, a Holocaust survivor with a daycare business takes in a 12-year-old street kid who recently robbed her.
movies.description_full: In seaside Italy, a Holocaust survivor with a daycare business takes in a 12-year-old street kid who recently robbed her.
movies.synopsis: In seaside Italy, a Holocaust survivor with a daycare business takes in a 12-year-old street kid who recently robbed her.

movies.title: Flash Gordon
movies.summary: Flash Gordon is an American football hero who is skyjacked aboard Dr. Hans Zarkov's rocketship along with his beautiful girlfriend Dale Arden. The threesome are drawn into the influence of the planet Mongo, ruled by Emperor Ming the Merciless. The evil Ming has been testing Earth with unnatural disasters, and deeming our world a threat to his rule. He also intends to take Dale as his concubine, attempts to execute Flash and intends to destroy Earth. Flash must avoid the amorous attentions of Ming's daughter, and unite the warring kingdoms of Mongo to rescue Dale and save our world.

movies.title: Dragonheart Vengeance
movies.summary: Lukas, a young farmer whose family is killed by savage raiders in the countryside, sets out on an epic quest for revenge, forming an unlikely trio with a majestic dragon and a swashbuckling, sword-fighting mercenary, Darius. Helena Bonham Carter voices Siveth, the ice breathing dragon who was once banished from the kingdom for failing to save the king's life. Compelled by the young man's cause, she emerges from hiding, using her fantastical powers on the trio's adventurous journey which brings revelations and rewards beyond vengeance. Dragonheart: Vengeance is an exciting action-adventure filled with fantasy and humor that will thrill the entire family.
